column3: What might you be interested in today?
Guildhests are small party-based operations overseen by the Adventurers' Guild.
In addition to being instanced, the battles have varying time limits.
Rewards for completing the operation are based on your party's performance. A bonus will be awarded the first time you complete a hest with each class.
A bonus will also be awarded for completing the operation with a minimal number of KOs.
New operations will become available as you increase in level or as you complete existing hests. Some operations can only be unlocked by speaking with certain battlewardens.
